Dear Matthew,
Great news! Your package is here! Whenever you're ready, go to the Luxer One lockers in your building, enter the access code 842851 and your package will be there, safe and sound and waiting for you. After you take your package, don't forget to shut the door!
Locker Location: In hallway, across from Mail room
Address: 1234 Fake Street
Unit: 1234
Here is a picture of the label:
Thanks so much for using Luxer One! No need to rush home. Your package will be ready when you are!
Need assistance or have a question about a package? Email us at support@luxerone.com or call (415) 390-0123.
